name: Keto Broccoli Cheddar Soup
author: thedailygourmet
summary: This is a keto-friendly, broccoli-Cheddar soup that hits those cravings when you want something creamy and comforting.
ingredients: freshly ground black pepper to taste
directions: Melt butter in a saucepan over medium heat
Add shallots and cook, stirring occasionally, until caramelized, about 5 minutes
Slowly pour in 1/2 cup chicken broth and stir to scrape up any bits of shallot
Add cream cheese and whisk to break up any lumps
Pour in remaining broth and whipping cream
Stir in Cheddar cheese, riced broccoli, and garlic granules
Add xanthan gum and whisk continuously until soup is thickened, 2 to 3 minutes
Serve immediately with freshly ground black pepper
